name: Space Shooter (Cazo0)
description:
This is my first game I've ever made.

You can controll the ship with WASD and shoot with left mouse click.

Leave a commen if you have suggestions what I can do better or what I shall improve on my game.

Thank you very much for playing! :)

Change Log:

  • fixed a bug where you were able to idle at the sides of the game area.
  • added sound effects and images to visualize the player's health and well... to make sounds to it.
  • now Windows 32Bit useres should be able to download and play the game on their device too.
